friendly: Welcome, traveler! {$Pull up a chair|Take a seat|Come on in}, the fire's warm and the ale's cold.
Ah, a new face! What can I get for you?
Welcome to my establishment! {$Room or refreshment|What brings you here}?
gruff: {$Hmph|Aye}. What'll you have?
Another one. {$Room or drink|Bed or ale|What do you want}?
We've got rooms and ale. Pick one.
cheerful: Hello there, friend! You look like you've traveled far!
Welcome, welcome! Come in from the cold and rest your feet!
suspicious: We don't see many travelers these days. What brings you?

friendly: Good day! Looking for something sturdy and well-made?
Welcome to my forge. I can craft whatever you need.
gruff: What do you want? Can't you see I'm busy?
Hmph. Need something repaired or forged?
boastful: You've come to the finest smith in the region! What do you need?
My work is known throughout the land. What can I make for you?

friendly: Good day! Browse my wares, finest quality guaranteed!
Welcome, welcome! I have exactly what you're looking for.
gruff: You buying or just looking?
What do you want? I haven't got all day.
talkative: Ah, a customer! Let me tell you about my latest acquisitions...
Welcome! I've just received a shipment from {$the capital|the east|across the mountains}...

friendly: Welcome to {settlement.name}. Keep your nose clean and you'll be fine.
Good day. What brings you to our settlement?
gruff: State your business.
Keep moving. Nothing to see here.
nervous: Ah, hello. Everything's... everything's fine here. Perfectly normal.
New face, eh? Well, welcome, I suppose.

friendly: Welcome to {settlement.name}! I'm the mayor. How may I help you?
Good day, traveler. I hope you find our settlement hospitable.
gruff: I'm a busy person. What do you need?
State your business quickly, I have matters to attend to.
boastful: Welcome to the finest settlement in the region, under my leadership!
I've made this settlement what it is today. What brings you here?

friendly: Blessings upon you, child. Welcome to our temple.
May the light guide you. How may I be of service?
gruff: Seek you wisdom or merely shelter from the world?
What brings you to this sacred place?
melancholy: Welcome, though I fear these are dark times for all of us.
Blessings... what few remain in these troubled days.

friendly: Good day! {$Just bringing in the harvest|Working the fields as usual}.
Hello there! Fine weather for {$planting|harvesting|tending the crops}.
gruff: City folk, eh? Don't see many out here.
Can't talk long, got work to do.
humble: Just a simple farmer, but welcome nonetheless.
Not much to see here, just honest work and honest soil.

friendly: Ho there! Just up from the mines. Thirsty work, that.
Good day! The earth has been generous lately.
gruff: What? Never seen a miner before?
Aye. What do you want?
secretive: Found something interesting in the deep tunnels recently...
The mines... they hold many secrets.

friendly: Welcome. Are you hurt or merely weary?
Good day. I hope you're in good health.
nervous: Oh! A patient? Or... are you well? I have herbs if you need them.
I'll do what I can, though resources are limited...
melancholy: Welcome. I've seen too much suffering lately, but I'll help if I can.
Another soul seeking relief from this weary world.

friendly: Ah, a visitor! Always pleasant to see a new face.
Welcome! Are you a fellow seeker of knowledge?
talkative: Excellent! Someone new to discuss my research with!
Do you have a moment? I've been working on a fascinating theory about...
secretive: What brings you here? I don't often receive visitors.
I'm quite busy with my research. What do you need?

boastful: Ah, a commoner. I suppose I can spare a moment.
What business could you possibly have with one of my station?
friendly: Good day. I hope the common folk are treating you well.
Welcome. Not all of noble birth are as... distant as some of my peers.
melancholy: The weight of title and duty grows heavier each day...
Once, this position meant something. Now...

friendly: Need a horse? I've got the finest steeds in the region!
Welcome to my stables. Looking after these beauties is my life's work.
gruff: What do you want? Buying or renting?
Don't have time for chitchat. State your business.

friendly: Fresh bread, just out of the oven! What can I get for you?
Welcome! The scent of fresh baking draws everyone in!
cheerful: Good morning! Nothing like the smell of fresh bread, eh?
Hello, hello! Try my pastries, they're famous around here!

friendly: Good cuts, fair prices. What'll you have?
Fresh meat today! Just got a new delivery.
gruff: What cut do you want?
Speak up. I haven't got all day.

friendly: Just back from the woods. Good hunting today!
Tracked a fine deer this morning. What brings you out here?
gruff: City type, eh? The forest isn't for everyone.
What?
secretive: The woods hold many secrets for those who know where to look...
I've seen... strange things in the deep forest lately.

friendly: Welcome! I have remedies for whatever ails you.
Good day. Looking for herbs, potions, or perhaps wisdom?
secretive: My knowledge comes from... unconventional sources.
The old ways are not forgotten by all.
talkative: Ah! Let me tell you about this fascinating root I found...
Plants! Nature's medicine! Each one has a purpose, let me explain...

friendly: Welcome to the tavern! Ale's cold and the company's warm!
Come in, come in! What's your poison?
talkative: Welcome! You should hear the stories I've heard in this place...
Ah, a new customer! Let me tell you what happened here just yesterday...

humble: Spare a coin for a poor soul?
secretive: People don't notice beggars... we see everything...
I know things. Things people would pay to learn...

friendly: Just passing through, like yourself.
Nice day, isn't it? For... business.
secretive: You looking to acquire something... difficult to obtain?
I can get things. For the right price.
